    SELECT *
FROM ANIMAL_INS

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 2

    • 16/10/2021

    SELECT NAME, DATETIME
FROM ANIMAL_INS
ORDER BY ANIMAL_ID DESC;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 3

    • 16/10/2021

    SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME
FROM ANIMAL_INS
WHERE INTAKE_CONDITION = 'Sick'
ORDER BY ANIMAL_ID;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 4

    • 16/10/2021

    SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME
FROM ANIMAL_INS
WHERE INTAKE_CONDITION <> 'Aged'
ORDER BY ANIMAL_ID;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 5

    • 16/10/2021

    SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME
FROM ANIMAL_INS;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 6

    • 16/10/2021

    SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME, DATETIME
FROM ANIMAL_INS
ORDER BY NAME, DATETIME DESC;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 7

    • 16/10/2021

    SELECT NAME
FROM ANIMAL_INS
ORDER BY DATETIME
LIMIT 1;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 8

    • 17/10/2021

    SELECT MAX(DATETIME)
FROM ANIMAL_INS;

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 9

    • 22/10/2021

    SELECT ANIMAL_ID
FROM ANIMAL_INS
WHERE NAME IS NULL

    Î¨∏Ï†ú 10

    • 22/10/2021

    SELECT ANIMAL_ID
FROM ANIMAL_INS
WHERE NAME IS NOT NULL
